name: 中国剩余定理
complexity: O(k) for standard CRT, O(k^2) for Garner algorithm
scenarios: Solving systems of linear congruences with pairwise coprime moduli; representing large integers with mixed radix; combining results from separate modular computations.
extensions: Garner algorithm for mixed radix representation; extension to non-coprime moduli via pairwise merging.
